title: നഷ്ടപ്പെട്ട നീലാംബരി | Nashtappetta Neelambari
description: This ebook is from DC Books, the leading publisher of books in Malayalam. DC Books' catalog primarily includes books in Malayalam literature, and also children's literature, poetry, reference, biography, self-help, yoga, management titles, and foreign translations.
